sentence: "I endorsed [Starbuck] months ago and I stand by my endorsement," tweeted Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C. "I endorsed Robby months ago & believe he's exactly what we need in these difficult times," wrote Trump-backed Arizona gubernatorial candidate Kari Lake.
author: Igor Derysh
title: Allies revolt after Trump endorses rival to MAGA darling: He 'has it completely wrong'

sentence: "I endorsed [Starbuck] months ago and I stand by my endorsement," tweeted Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C. "I endorsed Robby months ago & believe he's exactly what we need in these difficult times," wrote Trump-backed Arizona gubernatorial candidate Kari Lake.
author: Igor Derysh
title: 'Trump has it completely wrong': Allies revolt after Trump endorses rival to MAGA darling

sentence: Close allies of Mr. Trump — including Rep. Madison Cawthorn, North Carolina Republican; Kari Lake, the Trump-backed candidate for Arizona Secretary of State; and Jenna Ellis, a former lawyer for Mr. Trump — have already begun using Truth Social.
author: Ramsey Touchberry
title: Trump social media app debuts, but early glitches prevent some new users
